Model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object

    Represents the game that is being played by the player. The game algorithm is implemented in moderator application, this class just stores information received from moderator.

    This class is implemented as a singleton.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game()
      Constructs a new Game() object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game()
        Constructs a new Game() object. Initializes scoreTable as an empty HashMap and gameListener as an anonymous child of Tread with overridden method run().

        Typical singleton method to get the only instance of this object.

        the only instance of Game object.

      • updateScoreTable

        public void updateScoreTable(java.lang.String player,
                             int score)
        Updates score of specified player (adds a new player to scoreTable if needed).
        Parameters:
        player - identifier of the player.
        score - desired score value for the player.

      • getAnsweringPlayer

        public java.lang.String getAnsweringPlayer()
        Returns identifier of the player that answers (answeringPlayerID).
        Returns:
        answeringPlayerID.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets all fields to default values (as they were initialized in constructor).

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        If information broadcasting is enabled (Networking.isBroadcast) starts gameListener. Otherwise does nothing.

      • finishGame

        public void finishGame()
        Interrupts gameListener. (Maybe redundant).
